TopicTitle: Because why not. Sepratrons to space.

Articles.Content:
I made a challenge to the community where one of the levels is to use only sepratrons to reach space(Size-0 to orbit). Well, I have done it. I present you all the "Sepratrons to Orbit 2". This craft has 180 parts, most of which are sepratrons. It is capable of lifting 1 ton of payload(it's final stage) to an 80Km suborbital flight.
[IMG]http://i1346.photobucket.com/albums/p685/Jakalth/sepratrons%20to%20orbit/sepratrontoorbit1_zpstinuvwva.jpg[/IMG]

She's quite ugly, but gets the job done. I thought you all might get a kick out of the sheer stupidity of this craft. heh ;)

total mass 12.9 tons
number of engines 158
practicality... 0

[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/f7nwm6475gcer1n/sepratrons%20to%20orbit%202.zip?dl=1"]Download yours today.[/URL]
[IMG]http://i1346.photobucket.com/albums/p685/Jakalth/sepratrons%20to%20orbit/sepratrontoorbit11_zps7g2dxs0w.jpg[/IMG]

[URL="http://s1346.photobucket.com/user/Jakalth/sepratrons%20to%20orbit/story"]The full story can be found here.[/URL]
